meanings: (분량을 재는 단위) mal (≒18 liters), Korean unit of measure

vlive.korean: 빈이 기장 말이군! We're talking about Captain Moon Bin! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] ASTRO X SUITS KNIGHTS - 아스트로의 정장방!
vlive.english: We're talking about Captain Moon Bin!

vlive.korean: '그럼 없죠 뭐' 제가 한 말이군요. "It looks like I don't have anyone." That's what I said. 듣기 View video Girl's Day : 소진의 힐링타임 EP.5
vlive.english: "It looks like I don't have anyone." That's what I said.

vlive.korean: Everland 간다고 거짓말하지 말라는 말이군요. You mean we shouldn't lie that we will go to Everland. 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 기습일탈 삼총사 크크
vlive.english: You mean we shouldn't lie that we will go to Everland.

vlive.korean: 마지막을 장식하겠다는 말이군. - 야심차구먼. He's saying he'll be the grand finale. - He's ambitious. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] ASTRO X SUITS KNIGHTS - 아스트로의 정장방!
vlive.english: He's saying he'll be the grand finale. - He's ambitious.

vlive.korean: 말 잘 들어~ You listen well. 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
